attributes.action: Reintroduce National Service or 'Conscription', make todays young yobs do 2 years compulsory military service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The young of today are always saying they have nothing to do, and they are bored. If compulsory National Service was reintroduced it would take them off the streets and turn them into decent human beings.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
